lines.text: Excuse me. I got a phone call this morning. A voice said to come here and look for a girl on the phone. She'll be the girl of your dreams. 5'5', dark hair, blue eyes. She's wearing a dusty rose bikini and her name is Julie.
Well, you made a mistake. I'm 5'6'.

[to a girl he's just met]
I want it from you.
Want what?
Love.
Why? Do you love me?
No, I'm in love with a girl called Carol. I love your...
My what?
Your pussy.
How do you know that?
Of all the different kinds of pussy in the world; soft, hot, gravel, velvet, cold, wet, big, small, there's only one kind I can feel in my blood on sight. And that's silk, which is yours.

[playing a cassette in his boom box]
That's the Chiffons, Dad.
Where's that Jerry Vale tape I bought you for Christmas?

[taking it out and inserting it into his boom box]
Are you kidding? I'm meeting you for lunch, right?
Well, put it on, kid. I never understand you. Either it's got to be a 900 year old Kraut or 5 niggers with squeaky voices.

[annoyed]
Hey, waiter! Tell this character to turn his radio off!
What are you tellin' him for? Tell me!
All right, I'm tellin' ya - turn it off!

[with incredulity]
Do you believe this? This is the Jamies, man! "Summertime, Summertime!" - the most musically inventive song of 1958! What are you eating? Shrimp? Are you gonna tell me this song doesn't go with your shrimp?
The golden rule of urology - if you get an erection, you come, if you don't get an erection, you walk.

[interrupting her son's innocuous greeting]
I don't want to hear it.
What?
Whatever it is you plan to hurt me with.
Don't you understand? I'm going to bring you into dreams of yourself. All you have to do is believe in me.
What? You're so full of shit!
What if I want a slice of pizza?
Can't you read the signs outside? We don't sell sliced pizza.
What if I wanted 60 slices of pizza?
You deaf? No slice pizza! Take it on the arches!

[putting on a long rubber glove]
Relax. All I'm gonna do is slip a finger in.
Why d'ya need a glove on up to your elbow?
My arm's cold. Turn around and bend over.
I should have strangled you in your crib!
